> > >
> > >
> > > My messages haven't been getting through so:
> > >
> > > 1.Mustex and Stallex
> > > Location:Northern Chad
> > > Status:Traveling
> > > Destination:Egypt
> > > ETA:22 hours
> > >
> > > �Mustex and Stallex duel. Their double-bladed swords
> > > slice the air. It is
> > > sparring, but one mistake still means death. Stallex
> > > is by far the more
> > > talented fighter, but he can not match his father in
> > > strength and speed, so
> > > Mustex continues pushing Stallex back. Mustex gets a
> > > good blow to Stallex's
> > > chest. Stallex buckles under the pain.
> > > Mustex:Why did you stop?
> > > Stallex:It hurts.
> > > Mustex:Don't stop. If you don't give into the pain it
> > > will hurt 10 times
> > > more. If you give into the pain you're enemy will see
> > > that it hurts 100 times
> > > more. I've seen alot of bots fall from that mistake.
> > > Alot of bots wouldn't
> > > have bothered teaching you that. Now back to beast
> > > mode.
> > > Stallex:Beast Mode!
> > > Mustex:Beast Mode!
> > > Stallex:Internal repairs.
> > > �They begin to run off. The two horses run quickly
> > > over the desert.
> > > Stallex:What's our next mission.
> > > Mustex:Yours is in "Training City". There's a monkey
> > > there named Rhesus. He's
> > > an old friend and he can teach you about stealth.
> > > Stallex:What about you?
> > > Mustex:I have a plan to take out the "Iron Fist", but
> > > it's a 1 bot job.
> > > Stallex:You know how dangerous that is.
> > > Mustex:Yes but �it's even harder for 2 bots to
> > > infiltrate. I have a shot
> > > alone though.
> > > Stallex:O.k., but come back alive. I want to be the
> > > one to beat you.
> > > �They run off on their way to Egypt.
> > >
> > > 2.Mustex and Stallex
> > > Location:Training City,Egypt
> > > Status:Preparation
> > >
> > > �Mustex and Stallex walk into a room. Rhesus is
> > > sitting at a desk with his
> > > back to them. He is leaning over some circuits
> > > examining them. Mustex has his
> > > hands behind his back and is wearing his poker face.
> > > He knows the following
> > > conversation will be a simple matter of wearing down
> > > Rhesus who is completely
> > > oblivious to them.
> > > Mustex:Rhesus!
> > > �Rhesus jumps. Mustex walks around in front of him.
> > > Mustex:Still wasting precious Maximal computer space
> > > on your own private
> > > casino my,my,my. Stallex go start training with
> > > drones,Rhesus will be with
> > > you soon.
> > > �Stallex walks out.
> > > Rhesus:Ahh,my good friend. So the "Carnitrons" rise
> > > again. I can hear the cry
> > > "Carnitrons Carnivate". We were the only sensible
> > > group. We had a simple
> > > motto of "stay alive".
> > > Mustex:Shutup! If we were so great then why did I lead
> > > us to get ambushed by
> > > the "Alliance" for our first battle. As I recall 5 of
> > > the 7 of us were
> > > damaged beyond repair. Now I see that anything except
> > > a 2-way war leads to
> > > extra senseless casulties. That's why I intend to make
> > > everyone pick Maximal
> > > or Predicon. All you can think about is revenge on the
> > > "Alliance",and the
> > > rebirth of a lost cause. All I want is these parts and
> > > a transport.
> > > �Mustex hands Rhesus a paper. Rhesus looks upset as he
> > > reads it.
> > > Rhesus:Where am I going to get a D.N.A. simulator.
> > > Mustex:You're a bigger fool than I thought if you
> > > think I don't know where
> > > Fox Fingers got his.
> > > Rhesus:Even so it will take me several weeks, but pay
> > > could speed me up.
> > > Mustex:Did I mention I'm planning to take out the
> > > "Iron Fist" the Alliance
> > > will be permantly crippled.
> > > Rhesus:Well in that case just let me step into the
> > > next toom to get what you
> > > need. So,we can finally get revenge for Croctas,
> > > Kangato, Tigecs, Socrow, and
> > > my lovely Monkessa. I've just finished about half a
> > > dozen special
> > > hover-cycles. They should do fine for you.
> > > Mustex:Oh, and by the way I told my son you'd train
> > > him.
> > > Rhesus:Small price to pay. Does he know about the
> > > "Carnitrons" yet.
> > > Mustex:Not a clue.
> > > Rhesus:Don't worry I won't snich 'till you come to
> > > your senses.
> > > �Rhesus hands Mustex a large box of parts and walks
> > > away to train Stallex.
> > >

> > > Location:Training City,Egypt
> > > Status:Traveling

> > >
> > > Rhesus:Come back alive. You know I can't restart the
> > > "Carnitrons" without
> > > you.
> > > Mustex:You're not going to resart them with or without
> > > me.
> > > Rhesus:I'll take good care of the kid... Uh,that is
> > > until you get back.
> > > Mustex:bye
> > > �Mustex jumps onto his waiting hover-cycle and races
> > > off.
> > >
> > > 4.Mustex
> > > Location:Alliance Island, Spain
> > > Status:Infiltration
> > >
> > > �Mustex looks at the newly completed drone in front of
> > > him. He activates
> > > the D.N.A. simulator. The drone takes on his
> > > appearance. He is positioned 500
> > > yards from the "Iron Fist" so the Alliance won't risk
> > > an attack unless he
> > > gets closer. He activates another pocket sized drone.
> > > It begins its mission
> > > to plant a device he had built 100 yards from the
> > > base, 40 feet under. When
> > > his monitor says the drone is done he calls out the
> > > code that will activate
> > > the drones programming.
> > > Mustex:Beast Mode!
> > > �Mustex turns on his jammer and attaches it to his
> > > belt. The drone begins
> > > transmitting a Maximal �frequency,goes to Beast
> > > Mode,and bounds for the base.
> > > Mustex keeps low to the ground so he won't be spotted.
> > > The auto-guns begin
> > > firing, but no transformers come out. The horse jumps
> > > away from every shot.
> > > He stops at 100 yards away.
> > > Drone:Mustex Maximize!
> > > �The drone transforms and begins firing arrows at the
> > > shield of the base. He
> > > dodges all the beams,but only has enough power at this
> > > kind of level for 15
> > > minutes. Fortunately,he doesn't need that long. The
> > > main turrets fireand take
> > > him out. The shields flicker from power loss,but stay
> > > intact. Mustex then
> > > smiles when his monitor shows the pocket sized drone
> > > the pocket sized drone
> > > has reached the surface. He activates the device and
> > > it transmites a Maximal
> > > frequency. The drone then starts firing. It has enough
> > > power for 6 shots. The
> > > "Alliance" is beginning to sweat. The main turret
> > > fires again and the shield
> > > goes down. Mustex deactivates th device and charges.
> > > Mustex:Beast Mode!
> > > �As he charges he scans the base. The shields will be
> > > down for the next hour.
> > > It will be down for the next hour. It will take him 10
> > > minutes to navigate
> > > the corridors to his destination and 10 minutes to get
> > > back. He will go in
> > > the �one way they won't expect,The Front Door, 10
> > > yards away he transforms.
> > > Mustex:Mustex Maximize!
> > > �Mustex draws a cyber arrow and blows the door open.
> > > Using his frequency
> > > jammer as cover he sneaks to his destination. He walks
> > > into the Energon
> > > storage room. The Energon will magnify the explosion
> > > of the small explosive
> > > he made. He walks over to a computer console and hooks
> > > it up to the
> > > "Alliance" network. If a remote connection is placed
> > > on it it will blow from
> > > 2 connections to the network. It can detect the
> > > Energon and will blow if much
> > > is removed. It can detect the energon in the room and
> > > will blow if to much is
> > > removed. It takes 20 minutes to diffuse and it would
> > > be set for 15. There is
> > > no deactivation code. The full blast could probably
> > > not be contained. Even if
> > > the explosive is covered an electronic signal will
> > > ignite the energon. He set
> > > it and ran out.
